xml.data:
Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 11 Upādānagocchaka » 11.3 Upādānasampayuttaduka » 11.3.5 Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
11.3.5.1--4 Paccayānulomādi
Upādānagocchaka
Upādānasampayuttaduka
Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
Paccayānulomādi
62.
3683Upādānasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho upādānasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  upādānasampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā…  tīṇi.
3684Upādānavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho upādānavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Paṭiccasadisaṃ, arūpaṃyeva kātabbaṃ.)
3685Upādānavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho upādānasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Paṭiccasadisaṃ, arūpaṃyeva kātabbaṃ.)
3686Upādānasampayuttañca upādānavippayuttañca dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho upādānasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Paṭiccasadisaṃ, arūpaṃyeva kātabbaṃ.)
3687Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā cha (sabbattha cha), vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate cha.
3688Anulomaṃ.
3689Upādānavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho upādānavippayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
3690Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā cha, napurejāte cha, napacchājāte cha, naāsevane cha, nakamme cattāri, navipāke cha, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, navippayutte cha.
3691Paccanīyaṃ.
